decision.reasoning_trace: The consideration set was selected by prioritizing products with high user ratings (4.6 or above) and significant review validation. This selection aims to cover top performance tiers, value options, and specialized characteristics. 1. Endgame Gear XM2we (prod_mice_017) was included for having the highest catalog rating (4.9) at a strong value price ($79.99). 2. Logitech G Pro X 2 (prod_mice_001) is the premium flagship, featuring a 4.8 rating and extreme lightweight design (54g). 3. HyperX Pulsefire Haste 2 (prod_mice_006) was chosen for reliability and value, boasting the highest review count (4607) among the top-rated mice at $79.99. 4. MSI Clutch GM51 (prod_mice_020) was selected as the best representative of cutting-edge speed due to its 4.7 rating and 8000Hz polling rate. 5. Vaxee XE Wireless (prod_mice_016) was included for specialization, being the lightest mouse in the high-rating category (49g).
